text: umakku avarkal patil kuravitil, niccayamaka avarkal tam mana iccaikalaiye pinparrukirarkal enru nir arintu kollum; innum allahvitamiruntu nervali kattiyinrit tan mana iccaiyaip pinparrupavanaivita, mika vali kettavan evan irukkinran; niccayamaka allah akkiramakkara camukattarukku nervali katta mattan
